import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Container, Typography, Paper, Grid, Tabs, Tab, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, Divider, Card, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, TextField, Chip, Link as MuiLink } from '@mui/material'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import EcoIcon from '../../components/icons/EcoIcon'; import RecyclingIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Recycling'; import WaterIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Water'; import EnergySavingsLeafIcon from '@mui/icons-material/EnergySavingsLeaf'; import InventoryIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Inventory'; import SearchIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Search'; import SpaIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Spa'; import FactoryIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Factory'; import LocalShippingIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LocalShipping'; import ShoppingCartIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ShoppingCart'; /** * Page with sustainability guides and recommendations */ function SustainabilityGuidePage() { // State for active tab const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(0); // State for search query const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); // Handle tab change const handleTabChange = (event, newValue) => { setActiveTab(newValue); }; // Handle search const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // In a real application, this would filter the content console.log('Search query:', searchQuery); }; return ( {/* Hero Section */} Sustainability Guide Practical recommendations for making more sustainable product choices {/* Search Bar */} setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} sx={{ "& .MuiOutlinedInput-root": { "& fieldset": { border: "none" }, } }} size="small" /> {/* Category Tabs */} } label="OVERVIEW" /> } label="MATERIALS" /> } label="WATER USAGE" /> } label="ENERGY" /> } label="PACKAGING" /> } label="TRANSPORTATION" /> {/* Tab Content */} {/* Call to Action */} Ready to analyze your products? Start using the Environmental Impact Analyzer to make more sustainable choices. ); } /** * TabPanel component for switching between content */ function TabPanel(props) { const { children, value, index, ...other } = props; return (
{value === index && ( {children} )}
); } /** * Content for the Overview tab */ function OverviewContent() { return ( Sustainable Product Guide Making environmentally friendly product choices is a powerful way to reduce your carbon footprint and support sustainable practices. This guide provides practical recommendations for evaluating products across different environmental impact categories. Key Environmental Impact Categories Carbon Footprint The total greenhouse gas emissions caused during a product's lifecycle. Water Usage The water consumption and impact on water resources throughout production. Resource Consumption The raw materials used, their sustainability, and resource efficiency. Transportation The environmental impact of shipping products from manufacturer to consumer. How to Use This Guide Navigate through the tabs to explore specific sustainability topics and recommendations. Each section provides practical advice for evaluating products and making more environmentally friendly choices. You can also use our Product Analysis Tool to get personalized recommendations for specific products based on AI-powered environmental impact assessment. Quick Facts Sustainable Product Categories ); } /** * Content for the Materials tab */ function MaterialsContent() { return ( Sustainable Materials Guide The materials used in products have a significant impact on their environmental footprint. This guide helps you identify more sustainable material choices. Preferred Materials Certifications to Look For Ensures wood products come from responsibly managed forests. Guarantees organic textiles meet environmental and social criteria. Evaluates material health, recyclability, and manufacturing ethics. Verifies the percentage of recycled materials in a product. Materials to Avoid Practical Tips ); } /** * Content for the Water Usage tab */ function WaterContent() { // Simplified content - in a real app this would be more comprehensive return ( Water Usage & Conservation Water is a precious resource used throughout product lifecycles. Understanding water usage helps identify more sustainable options. Water Footprint Facts Choosing Water-Efficient Products Water Impact Analysis Our Environmental Impact Analyzer evaluates products' water usage across their lifecycle, from raw material extraction to manufacturing and distribution. By understanding water consumption patterns, you can make more informed choices and support products and companies that prioritize water conservation. ); } /** * Content for other tabs * In a real implementation, these would be fully developed */ function EnergyContent() { return ( Energy & Carbon Footprint This section would contain comprehensive information about energy usage and carbon footprint in product lifecycles. {/* Additional content would be added in a real implementation */} ); } function PackagingContent() { return ( Sustainable Packaging This section would contain comprehensive information about sustainable packaging options and their environmental impact. {/* Additional content would be added in a real implementation */} ); } function TransportationContent() { return ( Transportation & Shipping This section would contain comprehensive information about the environmental impact of product transportation and shipping methods. {/* Additional content would be added in a real implementation */} ); } export default SustainabilityGuidePage;
